name: Kodiak Wildlife Deterrent Horn (2016)
description: More assertive than bells, this compact horn puts out 112dB that can be heard a kilometre away. It doubles as a signalling device for an outdoor emergency kit.Operates with a simple push button.Canister provides 12, 2-second blastsContents are 100% ozone safe and non-flammable.Can be heard up to 0.8km on land and 1.6km on water.Height is 11.4cm.Replacement canisters available.
